# README

## Description

Rails tutorial based on the example available [here](https://guides.rubyonrails.org/getting_started.html)

### Using

1. Ruby: 3.4.5
1. Rails: 8.0.2.1

### Command used to generate the application

    rails new . database=postgresql -T - G
